subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mercer capped a sensational week for the low-major Atlantic Sun conference, stunning No. 18 Southern California, 96-81, and spoiling O. J. Mayo’s college debut yesterday in Los Angeles.
snippet: Mercer capped a sensational week for the low-major Atlantic Sun conference, stunning No. 18 Southern California, 96-81, and spoiling O. J. Mayo’s college debut yesterday in Los Angeles.
